Lagos City Polytechnic bụ polytechnic nke onwe ya na Ikeja, Lagos, Naijiria

Ọ na-enye ọmụmụ National Diploma na Accountancy, Banking & Finance na Business Studies.
Lagos City Computer College nwere njikọ na polytechnic.
National Board for Technical Education nabatara polytechnic.

Polytechnic ahụ guzobere na afọ 1990 site n'aka Injinia Babatunde Odufuwa dị ka ụlọ akwụkwọ agụmakwụkwọ mbụ nke onwe na Naịjirịa.
Ọ nwetara nkwado gọmentị na afọ 1995.
N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2002, polytechnic mere emume nnọkọ nke abụọ ya, ebe ihe dị ka ụmụ akwụkwọ 300 nwetara Diplomas dị elu ma ọ bụ Diplomas mba.
Otu onye nta akụkọ Sunday Sun katọrọ ụlọ ọrụ ahụ n'afọ 2006 bụ onye hụrụ usoro nnabata dị ala na ndị ọrụ ezughi oke.
